data.title: Extract dialogue success screen on script error
data.body:
Extract dialogue screen appears as success, even when script has errors. Despite this, dialogue.tab is not created when script has errors.

Issue occurred when extracting dialogue from script with error on missing label statement.

data.title: Fix some comments in options.rpy, and a typo in the docs.
data.body: These commits fix two typos in options.rpy (persisten -> persistent, themes.roundrect -> theme.roundrect) as well as remove the no longer true information about theme.roundrect being the only theme currently supported, as Ren'Py now comes with a huge variety of themes. They also fix a scary typo in the docs, naming the android.keystore file android.keyring in one place, which isn't the correct name, and a not-so-scary one with a missing K.

data.title: Translating documentation
data.body: Hi. I have recently submitted a Russian translation for the Launcher and the template game. The next logical step would be to translate the documentation. However, I don't think there is anything in the sphinx/*\* files that could be used for translations, correct me if I am wrong. I noticed that there already is a Japanese version of the docs, though, so I take it translations can be done. What would be the best way to approach this?

data.title: Why is this not called Sen'Py?
data.body: I'll take my reward for this brilliant idea by direct deposit, thank you.

data.title: Russian translation.
data.body: Added a Russian translation of the Ren'Py launcher, and a game template for Russian.

data.title: shift+R and call stack
data.body: http://lemmasoft.renai.us/forums/viewtopic.php?f=8&t=24613#p303962

data.title: Update Spanish translation
data.body:
- New translations 7f6c8ef.
- Small changes.

data.title: Please set "cython" to RENPY_CYTHON
data.body:
Currently, None is set as default variable, so we have to set RENPY_CYTHON manually regardless of our environment.
I think "cython" is most typical variable of RENPY_CYTHON. Please set it.

data.title: Persistent data must be saved before sleeping on Android.
data.body: Otherwise, we'll lose the preferences or any persistent flags that are set in the current session, if Android decides to kill us.

data.title: File access issues on mac systems
data.body: I've got my program set up to load all of the written contents of the game from a text document located within the game's directory.  It works fine on windows systems, but on mac ones the game can't find the file location.  It seems to be searching from the root directory rather then the game's directory.

data.title: added extra arguments for the screen to ShowMenu()
data.body: Fixes Issue #264

data.title: Support arguments in ShowMenu()
data.body: Show and ShowTransient support *args and **kwargs which will be passed to the actual screen, but ShowMenu does not.

data.title: Movable Speech Bubbles
data.body:
Promised a long time ago. Now that we have translations and auto-voice implemented, we can implement interactive speech bubble editing support.

http://lemmasoft.renai.us/forums/viewtopic.php?f=4&t=10746&start=15

data.title: fix typos
data.body:
Thanks for modification and adding explanation.

Please merge it to fix typos.

data.title: The images has been moved to the directory: "launcher/game/images".
data.body:
The images has been moved to the directory: "launcher/game/images".
- launcher/game/background.png -->  launcher/game/images/background.png
- launcher/game/checkbox_empty.png -->  launcher/game/images/checkbox_empty.png
- launcher/game/checkbox_full.png -->  launcher/game/images/checkbox_full.png
- launcher/game/logo.png --> launcher/game/images/logo.png
- launcher/game/logo32.png -->  launcher/game/images/logo32.png
- launcher/game/pattern --> launcher/game/images/pattern.png
- launcher/game/vscrollbar_center.png -->  launcher/game/images/vscrollbar_center.png
- launcher/game/winddow.png -->  launcher/game/images/window.png
- launcher/game/scrollbar_center.png --> launcher/ggame/images/scrollbar_center.png

The purpose of this change is to improve the order of the subdirectory: "launcher/game".

data.title: Fix delete the tmp directory
data.body:
Replaced: os.path.rmtree() --> shutil.rmtree()

It's also valid for 6.16.x.

data.title: The source package contains binary files.
data.body: Like .pyo, .rpyc, .rpyb, .rpycm, etc.

Requested by Shiz. 

Potential problem: What should we do if the displayable has been wrapped in a Transform?

data.title: Input limited by pixel width.
data.body: C_U asked for an input box that would take characters until a certain width is reached, and then stop.

data.title: Displayable that returns the current save-screenshot.
data.body: This can be used for various save-screen enhancements, giving the user a preview of what their save is going to look like.

data.title: config.keymap['toggle_music'] do nothing
data.body: The document writes config.keymap['toggle_music'] = ['m'], but but it seems pressing "m" doesn't work

data.title: QuickSave() takes a screenshot with the game menu screen
data.body:
When QuickSave() is ran showing the game menu, it takes a screen shot with the game menu screen. It should hide the game menu on its screenshot like a normal FileSave function.

How to check this issue:
Add 
textbutton _("QuickSave") action QuickSave() 
on the navigation screen of the tutorial, then press this button.

data.title: add suppot for freetype2 2.5.1
data.body:
Hi

freetype2 2.5.1 change include paths

now is "/usr/include/freetype2"

the ugly patch is:

https://github.com/renpy/renpy/blob/master/module/ttgsubtable.h#L6

change to: `#include <ftotval.h>`

and

https://github.com/renpy/renpy/blob/master/module/setup.py#L28

change to: `include("freetype.h", directory="freetype2")`

greetings

data.title: default_afm_enable is refered only first
data.body:
Default preferences should be refered to only first.
But default_afm_enable is refered to every time.
I fixed it.

data.title: Fixed pseudo-typo in Spanish options.rpy
data.body:
- Before 1999, the adverb 'solo' took the tilde in all cases.
- After 1999, it was optional. (Diccionario Panhispnico de dudas)
- With the new grammar (2009-2011) this tilde is not allowed.

references:
http://reglasespanol.about.com/b/2012/08/28/nueva-ortografia-solo-sin-acento.htm
http://blog.lengua-e.com/2007/solo-con-tilde-o-sin-tilde/
